staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.';
staging.post-deploy: cd client ; nvm use ; npm i ; pm2 stop 'engagement-lab-website-client' ; npm run build-qa ; pm2 start 'engagement-lab-website-client'; cd ../server ; nvm use ; npm i ; pm2 restart 'engagement-lab-website-server'

production.post-deploy: cd client ; nvm use ; npm i ; pm2 stop 'engagement-lab-website-client' ; npm run build ; pm2 restart 'engagement-lab-website-client'; cd ../server ; nvm use ; npm i ; pm2 restart 'engagement-lab-website-server'
